content.label: So many levels, so many mysteries. I keep playing because you never know what you'll find depending on the weather and time of day. If it's raining where you are, it's also raining in the game! Loved the first Spider, but this is so much better.
This game is not ready to be released in its current state. It might be worth $1.99, but is certainly not worth $4.99.
This is an amazing game! I mean it is genius man! So creative and innovative, even better than the first spider!!!!!!!! All I have to say is wait not another minute and press download!

I have a few complaints about this game but before I get into it I have to say I loved the original game and I do like this game so far... So here it goes first off I have it connected to my location which is wrong it says I am 5 hours from my location. Now next I am confused by the puzzle pieces do I collect them all for them to make sense or do I use them in the location only? Number three some of the locations are just flat out annoying to beat and I keep getting irritated by certain bugs that are way too hard to catch in their location or I can't find the bugs in the location... Or their are just annoying obstacles I can't get around. I really hope as this game gets updated some of my concerns will be fixed.

title.label: LOVE IT! (And I hate spiders normally!)

content.label:
I love this game! It's so original! I haven't played the first one but I'm almost done with this one, so I'll get the first one after I finishing this one. 
So I recently unlocked the last spider and, ITS A WALRUS?!?!? I mean it's cool but, really? A walrus? Anyways it's a really great game!

I played the first version so many times it was ridiculous. I was thrilled to see the new version and it's beyond expectations. It's very challenging which is great, so I'll be playing for a long time. And the graphics are gorgeous.  Well done!  Highly recommended!

title.label: Too much of a good thing?

content.label: This sequel expands extensively on the first game—which I enjoyed quite a bit, back in the day—but here in the sequel, I find myself grinding to a halt a few hours in. Too many bugs to eat?
Fun controls, not a stressful game but still rewarding. The only thing like it is the original Spider game. This one is better in every way and definitely worth a download.

title.label: Great sequel, but update has killed any challenge

content.label: Let's be clear - this is fantastic sequel to a fantastic game, one of mobile's true shining moments. The most recent update, however, has reduced the gameplay to essentially going through the motions of the game's mechanics, all challenge has basically been removed with the retooling of the game's puzzles. I understand that Tiger Style wants to appeal to the broadest audience possible, but this update has pretty much killed it for me. It would have been fantastic if they had implemented tiered difficulty levels instead.
I love the storytelling concept. This game is fun, looks gorgeous, and has a cool story. I love all the little details put into this game!

I loved the first spider, but I am stuck in the carriage house - can read music, but cannot figure out how to play. Downloaded a new version that was supposed to bypass solving the puzzles but it does not, so I am still stuck. If Tiger Style needs a tester, they are available.

Finding out that there's now a sequel to the original Spider made my day. Gorgeous game so far, looking forward to progressing in it. And the spider is adorbs! ::::3

Update: GOTY 2015. Amazing. I have unlocked all the spiders and rooms, but the more I play the more little hints and Easter eggs I find about suspicious goings-on. There is so much love and detail in this game!
Update 2: I would totally pay for more spiders.

title.label: Tons of great content, no IAPs

content.label: Hours of content, slick controls, great puzzle/action play. Premium game with no IAP gets my support 100%. Vote with your wallet.
this game is really fun game ^^
A very enjoyable game. Made complex with the weather elements, you could play forever and still not understand everything! All in all, 5 stars!

Based on the first one. And it's another excellent game that I am enjoying. =) I knocked off one star for three reasons. 1) the music is far from "atmospheric" imo, just in itself and especially based on the title and promise of the game. 2) I have no idea how to solve the first mystery and can find no help; 3 pictures of 3 clues---do I drag them do I do something in the game, wth! 3) navigation through map, high scores, bugs caught, etc. is non-existent; whatever little icon/links appear in the corners of a screen, that's where you can go! It's an odd and frustrating choice. Annoying and kind of odd choices based on the excellent atmosphere and navigation of TS' other games, but still a great game. ***After the last(first) update: I could alter the weather before the update, but not now. Also frustrating.

So I'm about finished with the entire game. It was definitely more difficult and more complex than the original spider. I agree this is a worthy successor and graphics are so much better and I love the clue and puzzle aspect. I like the bug combo deal I've got scholar and Knight ranks in many levels. On other words it's worth $4.99 and possible to beat unless you're a idiot and can't pay attention.
Loved the first one, LOVE this one!

Wowza, Spider: Rite of the Shrouded Moon is an outstanding game, and one of my favorite gaming experiences on my iOS devices. Part puzzle, part action-adventure, the game is absolutely beautiful with smart controls and addictive gameplay. Replayability is high thanks to the really interesting weather and time features- I find myself wanting to go back to levels over and over to catch new bugs that appear in new conditions (not to mention I love going back to levels just to see the lush environments!). The soundtrack is also really great and diverse. This is a deeply unique experience that is hard to articulate in just a short review, but I highly suggest you grab this game- remarkably well done, this is one of the best games you'll find on iOS.

title.label: Need to provide support for customers.

content.label: This game is fun...when you can play it. Here's the thing, if I spent 4.99 on the game, you need to provide gameplay support. I understand the concept of having lots of different options and secrets, but you need to help us out with these mysteries. I got the first one, but I can't unlock two more areas because I haven't figured the others out. I want to unlock the whole game first before I go explore more in depth. I understand that makes the game challenging, but you shouldn't keep me locked out of something I paid for OR provide written instructions on what to do with the clues, because I'm literally stuck and a little angry since I paid so much for the game. Please help us out.
Cool one!

title.label: Without Question 5 Stars ... Buy it now!

content.label: Seriously! The first Spider won some serious awards back in the day. I love a gaming company who doesn't just go about and beyond their old version, but raises the bar for other games across the market. They have incorporated so many more ideas and variables to the game that my mind is blown. The detail is wonderful, the game play is fluid and innovative, the art is wonderful, that is what I would have said about the first game, and Spider 2 tops all of those 200%. I have had no bugs with the original, but they have an update out already. My only complaint is that I hope they do not make us wait another five years for the third installment.
Fun!

title.label: READ THIS IF YOU DONT GET 'MYSTERIES'

content.label:
READ THIS! A lot of people have been confused by clues, I'll explain it. Basically each set of levels, (South Mansion, North Mansion, etc) has a certain amount of clues to find. For example, (spoilers, but a lot of people are confused so it has to be done), in South Mansion, you can find a record player thing. Jump on it, and a song will play and a record will play. Jump on it again, another song will play. Jump on it again and a message pops out that says FACADE. I figured it out by interacting with the clues. Next, go to the inside of the organ and jump on the keys to spell FACADE. The mystery is solved.

Basically just go to the levels with the clues, find the objects and interact with them. If you find a note, try to piece together what it means. SORRY for spoiling, but people seemed to be really confused.

Anyways.....

One of the best games I have on iOS. I had the first game years ago and I loved it a lot, but it wasn't really supported with new iPhones so I stopped. 

This game is mysterious and gloomy and has lots of exploring, which is what I love. Levels have TONS of replay value; there are complex ways you can get combos to get higher scores, and there are secret rooms and clues to find. Also, unlike the first game (from what I remember), this game has puzzles (mysteries). At first I didn't realize how to solve a mystery so maybe there should be a little bit of info because I really had no idea what to do. Then I figured it out and now I love the game.

SERIOUSLY! Get this game--if gives you tons of content, tons of atmosphere, tons of strategy, tons of puzzles, and it's addicting.

Love the graphics and catching bugs to open portals is a blast. However having to solve the mystery to move on is annoying as you have to wait for the weather or light cycle to change before you can collect all the clues. It ruins the whole flow of the game. If you could manually change this it would be great but all you can do is wait for another day to play.

title.label: Revisiting the epic early iOS gaming days

content.label: There is an innocent perfection to this game, revisiting, but not rehashing, all that made touch gaming so wonderful.

The app is SUPER fun it is more advanced and entertaining then the first version. It has weather and time game play. When it is day in real life it is day in the game! It's the best! My only complaint that I can get past the first challenge which is kinda difficult to figure out but that just adds to the fun because most games now and days are way too easy but this one is pretty challenging. All and all great game!

This app has some bugs (pun intended) that need to be fixed...1. How do you get a high enough score to reach scholar rank and open up the next area? I found all the bugs and one hidden area in each of the first five levels but only reached scholar in two, so could not move on. 2. Then I tried manually changing the weather to see if that was the problem, which it wasn't, and then the option to change the weather/time disappeared and I could not change it back and had to reinstall and start over. Is time a factor in your rank? If so, that is not clear. So I have just played these five levels like 5 times each and can't open up the next area. Frustrating! 3. As others said, what do you do with the clues? That is confusing. I collected them but can't find a way to use them. Please fix these issues and this will be a 5 star app. Loved spider 1.

Update: after the app update it seems that it is impossible to get scholar rank at all. This game is really frustrating. You need to make it possible to advance to the next location!

I was so happy to see the second game was out, I immediately downloaded it. More features have been added, but I think it makes it not as smooth to play. Plus, my progress has not been saved anytime I've had to exit. So overall, it's been a disappointment.
its around gb i dont have the memory right now

I love this game. It is truly fantastic. I love all the features in it and I love the weather feature and how your just living the life of a spider finding books and crannies. This is a game you should definitely buy. But, in a future update you should be able to hang from your thread to make it more spider-like.

I have not even opened it yet and I am already in love. I can't believe you all made a sequel. Thank you, thank you, thank you because the first Spider is ( to this day ) the most intelligently produced game I have ever played on the iOS platform.

title.label: Just as good as the first!

content.label: Instabuy! Love the weather/time of day thing as well!
Really enjoying this game. The gameplay is smooth, fluid, and very satisfying. Great atmospheric art and music really enhance this title as well. Best thing I've played on iOS in a long time!
THIS IS A GREAT GAME,AND IS WORTH THE PRICE PAID. I LIKE GAMES YOU DO NOT HAVE TO BE A SPEED DEMON TO PLAY. I THANK YOU FOR A GREAT GAME.

I been waiting for this game, it’s an amazing platformer with tons of unlockables and content. My only complaint is the weather feature does not work always. I assume its just cause my location is weird but all in all its really good.

This game is so amazing with the experience of being a spider detective. In the first game I actually got to solve the mystery with the secret treasure room, anyways lets talk about the new game now. I love that the weather and time can change, you can find clues, and solve more than one mystery. But I wish that the mystery had better described clues because some are really hard to understand. This is one of the best games I've ever played in forever. This is in my top 5 favorite games.
This is an excellent and crafted experience that does not cut corners. I'm amazed at the level of detail and story that the developers have out in to this one. Don't miss it!

I absolutely loved the original TigerStyle Spider game. This one is even better. Just as addictive and fun as the original, and the art, music, whole experience is stellar. The creators of this game nailed it.

title.label: Weather feature hasn't worked for me

content.label: I like the spider's movement, and the controls are fun. There are also hidden areas to find and an insect collection to complete. It's not an addicting game, but it is fun to play a level here or there for a few minutes at a time. I'd have given this game five stars, but the weather feature doesn't seem to work: I bought this game during a thunderstorm with heavy rain, yet the game said it was a clear day. 😒 The weather feature is what hooked me to buy it in the first place, so yeah...a little disappointed about that. Still, it is overall a very nice game!
Spider 2 is a fantastic follow up to one of the best games in the App Store. Great soundtrack too :-)
Bigger and better than its now ancient predecessor, Spider Rite of the Shrouded Moon comes from a developer with a long streak of fantastic and inventive hits. You won't go wrong buying this game.

title.label: You can't miss out on this game.

content.label: This is simply one of the most polished creative games I have played on IOS. I will put some other games aside for now to continue to be fascinated at what lies in store in Spider: Rite of the Shrouded Moon

title.label: At last. But what happened to the great music from one ?????

content.label: Its about time. Nice improvements compared to part one. EXCEPT. It lost its great music and setting that made the first one so amazing.

title.label: Oh yeah, even better than the first Spider!👍

content.label: Awesome game. A lot like the first BUT it is outdoors and features the weather outside your own window!  As a former developer, I heartily applaud Tiger Style for their creativity.  Buy this app now!
If you enjoy atmosphere, tight mechanics, and a great soundtrack this is a must-have. Works on many levels and the day / night stuff is really neat.

Can't believe it's been 5 years since the first Spider. Tiger Style has outdone themselves with this sequel. The graphics and atmosphere are incredible and the gameplay is even more seamless than the original. Add to that the new weather engine that matches the weather near you in reality, and you've got yet again a must have release for iOS. These guys can do no wrong.
First game was a classic second was well worth the wait, new classic in the making!
